translation.en: ♪ She's True ♪ True!
♪ True ♪ True!
♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪ ♪ Hero, hero! ♪
♪ She's True! ♪
♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom! ♪
Huh! It's happening!
Bartleby, it's happening!
♪ It's Happy Hearts Day ♪ ♪ Happy, Happy Hearts Day ♪
♪ It's the day that always makes us... ♪ ♪ Happy! ♪
translation.es: Es el día que siempre nos pone felices

translation.en: ♪ I give you a happy heart ♪
♪ You give me a happy heart ♪
translation.es: Y tú me das uno a mí

translation.en: ♪ And we love how it makes us both feel happy ♪
♪ Once a year, we sing a song ♪
translation.es: Una vez por año cantamos y celebramos

translation.en: ♪ And celebrate the love we feel for all our friends everywhere! ♪
translation.es: Una vez por año cantamos y celebramos Por nuestros amigos en todas partes

translation.en: - ♪ So hold your heart ♪ - ♪ And close you eyes! ♪
translation.es: - Toma un corazón - Cierra los ojos

translation.en: - ♪ Think happy thoughts ♪ - ♪ You'll be surprised ♪
translation.es: - Piensa en cosas lindas - Y verás

translation.en: ♪ At all the love inside of you to share ♪
♪ Oh, it's Happy Hearts Day ♪ ♪ Happy, Happy Hearts Day ♪
translation.es: Es el Día de los Corazones

translation.en: ♪ It's the day that always makes us... ♪ ♪ Happy! ♪
translation.es: El día que siempre nos pone felices

translation.en: ♪ You give me a happy heart ♪ ♪ I give you a happy heart ♪
translation.es: Te doy un corazón Y tú me das uno a mí

translation.en: ♪ It feels good to make somebody happy ♪
♪ It feels good to make somebody happy ♪
♪ It feels good to make somebody happy! ♪ Yeah!
Happy Hearts Day is the best day ever.
translation.es: El Día de los Corazones es lo mejor.

translation.en: We're down to our very last delivery.
Terrific topaz! You certainly moved fast.
I only just started delivering my happy hearts to all my friends.
translation.es: Yo recién comienzo a entregar corazones a mis amigos.

translation.en: It helps if you sing the song while you work. That's a pro tip. Click- click!
translation.es: Un consejo valioso: es más rápido si vas cantando.

translation.en: We're almost done delivering our happy hearts.
The only person left on our list is Glummy Glooma.
translation.es: El único que nos queda es Glummy Glooma.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but Glummy Glooma never ever, ever shows up on Happy Hearts Day.
translation.es: Glummy nunca viene a festejar el Día de los Corazones.

translation.en: Why not? I thought attendance was mandatory.
It's so much fun when everyone's together.
translation.es: Es muy divertido estar todos juntos.

translation.en: It certainly is, but Glummy likes to be gloomy by himself in Soggy Bottom Swamp.
translation.es: ¡Claro que sí! Pero a Glummy le gusta estar solo en el pantano Mojado.

translation.en: That's just how he likes it.
That's so sad. Nobody should be alone and gloomy on Happy Hearts Day.
translation.es: ¡Qué triste! Nadie debería pasar solo el Día de los Corazones.

translation.en: Happy Hearts Day, Your Highness!
translation.es: Feliz Día de los Corazones, alteza.

translation.en: Hello, Farmer Mosser.
And a Happy Hearts Day to you.
Oh, blue bother! I almost forgot.
Wait a minute, Farmer Mosser. I have a little something to share with you!
translation.es: Espere un minuto. Tengo algo para usted.

translation.en: - You know what, Bee? - What?
We should go see Glummy Glooma and bring him a happy heart.
translation.es: Visitemos a Glummy y llevémosle un corazón.

translation.en: I...don't know if Happy Hearts Day is really Glummy's thing, True.
translation.es: No sé si le gustará, Vera.

translation.en: He seems more like a Mopey Mumble Month kinda guy.
translation.es: Parece que le gustaría más el Mes de la Melancolía.

translation.en: This Happy Hearts Day, we're going to help Glummy be the happiest he can be.
translation.es: En este bello día, lo ayudaremos a ponerse lo más feliz posible.

translation.en: Great! Um... Yeah! The happiest he can be.
Come on!
The happiest he can be.
Glummy! Glummy Glooma!
Glummy?
OK, I've heard that Glummy lives in a hollowed- out tree.
translation.es: Oí que Glummy vive en ese árbol ahuecado.

translation.en: So let's stay sharp and be on the lookout.
Uh, look out! Something sharp!
Oh! It's Glummy Glooma! Glummy!
Glummy Glooma!
Glummy, it's True!
Remember me?
He must be getting snacks ready for us.
Happy Hearts Day, Glummy!
Uh, no thanks.
He seems sadder than usual.
I'm not sad. I just want to be by myself.
translation.es: No estoy deprimido, solo quiero estar solo.

translation.en: But, Glummy, it's Happy Hearts Day.
translation.es: Pero es el Día de los Corazones.

translation.en: The happiest day of the year!
And I came all the way here to give you your very own happy heart!
translation.es: Vine hasta aquí a darte un corazón muy feliz.

translation.en: Oh, joy!
OK, I guess you won't leave till I come out.
translation.es: Bueno, supongo que no se irán hasta que yo salga.

translation.en: Nope!
You know, happy's not really my thing.
Huh? Happy is everyone's thing.
See? Now you try?
Uh, what do I do with it?
No, no, no! You don't eat it. You...
- Huh! Your happy heart looks kind of... - Blue!
Oh? Um... I broke it, didn't I?
I'm sorry.
Maybe try giving it a hug and think happy thoughts.
translation.es: Prueba darle un abrazo, y piensa en algo feliz.

translation.en: I don't know what that is.
Happy thoughts are things that make you feel good.
translation.es: Piensa en algo que te haga sentir bien.

translation.en: Go ahead, think of your favourite things, like balloons.
translation.es: Piensa en tus cosas favoritas. Como los globos.

translation.en: Fishy Poof Crackers! Or baby rock critters.
You never know unless you try.
translation.es: Nunca podrás si no lo intentas.

translation.en: Fine!
That...doesn't usually happen, does it? I've never seen that happen.
translation.es: - Eso no es normal, ¿no? - Nunca vi algo igual.

translation.en: It's like it's turned into an unhappy heart.
translation.es: Parece que se le fue lo feliz.

translation.en: You did think of your favourite things, didn't you?
Oh, rainclouds, melted ice cream.
Oh, no one in my swamp. My very favourite things.
translation.es: Mi pantano solitario... Todo lo que más me gusta.

translation.en: I've got a funny feeling about that blue heart.
translation.es: Hay algo raro con ese corazón azul.

translation.en: - Let's keep an eye on it, Bee. - Just in case.
translation.es: No lo perdamos de vista. - Por las dudas. - Sí.

translation.en: Just in case. Cumulo!
See that blue heart over there?
The one with the super- sad face, like this. Uhh!
Things could start to get frowny. So we need to follow it.
translation.es: Puede que se ponga mal. Debemos seguirlo. Ya volvemos, Glummy.

translation.en: We'll be right back, Glummy.
Go, go, Cumulo!
Frowny? Me likey.
Oh! Go, Cloud.
Go!
Oh! There it goes!
It's heading towards the Wishing Tree.
translation.es: Hacia el árbol de los deseos.

translation.en: Don't worry, True. Maybe the happy heart will turn the unhappy heart pink and happy again.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Quizás los otros lo ayuden a ponerse feliz de nuevo.

translation.en: Or not!
Oh, no! Now all the happy pink hearts have turned blue and gloomy.
translation.es: Ahora todos los corazones se pusieron azules y tristes.

translation.en: Come on, Cumulo, follow that blue heart before it turns everybody gloomy.
translation.es: Vamos, Cúmulo, sigue a ese corazón antes que ponga triste a todos.

translation.en: Oh, look. Everything's coming up blue.
Whoopie!
Why, aren't you just the tastiest- looking little Nummle Berry?
Perfect for making jam.
But I don't like jam any more. It's too yummy.
translation.es: Pero ya no me gusta la jalea. Es demasiadoo sabrosa.

translation.en: Farmer Mosser!
Farmer Mosser, have you seen a blue heart floating around?
translation.es: Granjero Mosser, ¿vio a un corazón azul por aquí?

translation.en: Huh! You're a bit...blue.
- And you seem kind of gloomy. - Oh, True.
translation.es: Y parece un poco triste. Vera, no.

translation.en: Me, gloomy?
- Well, ain't that something. - It's the blue heart!
It was on Farmer Mosser. That blue heart must be what made him gloomy.
translation.es: Estaba posado sobre él. El corazón azul lo puso triste.

translation.en: Age of cerulean! Where did all these blue hearts come from? Is this a happy heart?
translation.es: ¡Santo índigo! ¿De dónde salieron estos corazones azules? ¿Es un corazón feliz?

translation.en: Well, kinda.
It looks like a happy heart, but a little different.
translation.es: Parece un corazón feliz, pero es distinto.

translation.en: Yeah, well, the main difference is, I guess that it's blue
translation.es: La mayor diferencia es que este es azul,

translation.en: and also if it touches you, it doesn't make you happy.
translation.es: y si te toca, no te pone feliz.

translation.en: - It makes you gloomy. - Oh, dear!
- Just like Glummy Glooma. - You rang?
Glummy Glooma! You left Soggy Bottom Swamp on Happy Hearts Day?
translation.es: ¡Glummy Glooma! ¿Dejaste el pantano el Día de los Corazones?

translation.en: Per...per...perplexing pink! I'm perplexed!
Watch out.
Rainbow King!
Told ya!
When did it get so sunny?
First Farmer Mosser and now Rainbow King!
translation.es: Primero el granjero. Y ahora el rey Arcoíris.

translation.en: Soon everyone's going to turn gloomy.
So how do we fix Happy Hearts Day now?
translation.es: ¿Cómo arreglamos el Día de los Corazones?

translation.en: Wait! I have an idea.
Happy Hearts to the rescue!
Moping mauve!
Look at his cheery mess.
OK, that did not work.
We need Wish help. Come on, Bartleby.
- Look out, Cumulo! - Don't touch those...
translation.es: ¡Cuidado, Cúmulo! No toques esos corazones o te pondrás muy triste.

translation.en: blue hearts or you'll become... Gloomulo.
translation.es: No toques esos corazones o te pondrás muy triste.

translation.en: Attagirl, Cumulo. That was some top- notch flying.
translation.es: Buen trabajo, Cúmulo. Volaste muy bien.

translation.en: Zee!
True! Bartleby!
- Happy Hearts Day. - Oh!
Thank you... We've got an emergency!
We need to save Happy Hearts Day.
Huh! Wait, what do you mean?
I wanted everyone to feel happy so I gave a happy heart to Glummy Glooma.
translation.es: Quería ver a todos felices, y le di un corazón a Glummy Glooma.

translation.en: Then he thought gloomy thoughts instead of happy thoughts.
translation.es: Pero pensó en algo triste y no feliz.

translation.en: And then the pink happy heart turned blue.
translation.es: Y el corazón se puso azul.

translation.en: And then Farmer Mosser and Rainbow King got gloomy.
If we don't do something fast, everyone will be gloomy
translation.es: Si no lo detenemos, todos se pondrán tristes

translation.en: and instead of the happiest day of the year, it will be the gloomiest day... EVER!!
translation.es: y en lugar del día más feliz del año, ¡será el más triste!

translation.en: Active asteroids! That is an emergency. Let's sit...
translation.es: ¡Asteroides! Sí que es una emergencia. Sentémonos y pensemos bien.

translation.en: and have a think.
OK, True, how can the Wishing Tree help you?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede ayudarte el árbol de los deseos?

translation.en: Well...
First, I need a way to stop the blue hearts from making more people gloomy.
translation.es: Primero debo impedir que los corazones azules pongan triste a más gente.

translation.en: Then, I need a way to change anyone who's already gloomy
translation.es: Y luego debo hacer que todos los que estén tristes

translation.en: back to being themselves again.
The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
It is time to get your three Wishes.
I'm ready!
Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree, please share your wonderful Wishes with me!
translation.es: Arbolito de los deseos grandiosos, por favor, quiero compartir deseos.

translation.en: ♪ Wishing Tree ♪ ♪ Share with me ♪
♪ Tiny Wishes, one, two, three ♪
♪ Wishing Tree, please share with me ♪
♪ Magic power for you and me ♪
translation.es: Que tu magia yo quiero ver

translation.en: ♪ Magic power ♪ ♪ In the Wishing Tree ♪
translation.es: Con tu magia Árbol de los deseos

translation.en: True, these Wishes are absolutely incredible!
Let's see what the Wishopedia says about their powers.
translation.es: A ver qué dice la Deseopedia de sus poderes.

translation.en: This is Goopy.
An amazing bubbledome Wish that can keep anything contained.
translation.es: Un deseo burbuja que puede contener cualquier cosa.

translation.en: Can it contain my excitement?
Goopy, you can stop the blue hearts from leaving the Wishing Tree,
translation.es: Goompy, puedes impedir que los corazones azules

translation.en: - so they don't touch anyone else. -
Introducing Slurpo!
I love this Wish!
Slurpo!
Slurpo's a vacuum Wish that can gather anything up with super- strong force.
translation.es: Slurpo es un deseo que puede aspirarlo todo con mucha fuerza.

translation.en: Slurpo! Slurpo, Slurpo, Slurpo!
Wow!
Slurpo, I'll bet you can slurp up
translation.es: Slurpo, puedes aspirar a todos los corazones azules

translation.en: all the blue hearts that have already left the Wishing Tree.
translation.es: Slurpo, puedes aspirar a todos los corazones azules que ya se fueron del árbol.

translation.en: And finally, we have Sizer, a size wish.
translation.es: Por último, Sizer, un deseo de tamaño.

translation.en: He can make anything teeny- tiny or super- big.
translation.es: Puede agrandar las cosas, o hacerlas muy pequeñas.

translation.en: - Hi, Sizer! Great to see you again. - A- ha!
I'm not sure how you'll help us make everyone un- gloomy,
translation.es: No sé cómo nos ayudarás a alegrar a todos,

translation.en: but I'm sure we'll find a way.
Zoo Zip Zap, Wishes in my pack!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, deseos a mi mochila!

translation.en: - Thanks, Zee. - Good luck, True.
- See ya, Bartleby! - Bye, Zee.
Thank you, Wishing Tree. We're sorry you're feeling a little blue.
translation.es: Gracias, árbol de los deseos. Lamento que estés azul.

translation.en: OK, Bee, we need to keep these unhappy hearts here.
translation.es: Bartleby, debemos contener a esos corazones tristes.

translation.en: Time for my first Wish.
Zip Zap Zoo, I choose you!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, te elijo a ti!

translation.en: Wake up, Goopy! Wish come true!
Hi, Goopy. I know you can bubble over anything.
translation.es: ¡Hola! Sé que puedes hacerte burbuja y envolver todo.

translation.en: We need you to wrap yourself around the entire Wishing Tree.
translation.es: Debes envolver todo el árbol de los deseos.

translation.en: - Ready? -
It's Goopy time!
- Whoa! - Nice!
Good job, Goopy.
You keep all these blue hearts here. We'll go figure out how to un- gloom everyone!
translation.es: Contiene a los corazones azules, y veremos cómo alegrar a los demás.

translation.en: Uh, True, we missed some blue hearts and they're heading to the city!
translation.es: Vera, unos corazones azules escaparon y van hacia la ciudad.

translation.en: We've got to stop them! Time for my second Wish!
translation.es: ¡Debemos detenerlos! Hora de mi segundo deseo.

translation.en: Zip Zap Zoo, I choose you!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, te elijo a ti!

translation.en: Wake up, Slurpo! Wish come true.
Hi, Slurpo!
Slurpo!
Hope you're hungry, cos we've got to slurp up all those hearts.
translation.es: Ojalá tengas hambre, porque debes aspirar corazones.

translation.en: Let's clean up this town.
There's one more!
Whooo! Way to slurp it, Slurpo! Thanks for your help.
translation.es: ¡Muy bien, Slurpo! Gracias por tu ayuda.

translation.en: You're excused, Slurpo.
Back in my pack.
Now we just have to un- gloom the Wishing Tree
translation.es: Debemos alegrar al árbol de los deseos

translation.en: - and anyone else who's been gloomified. - But how do we do that?
translation.es: y a todos los que estén tristes. ¿Cómo lo haremos?

translation.en: Well, the Wishing Tree got gloomy after a blue heart landed on it.
translation.es: El árbol se puso triste cuando un corazón azul se posó sobre él.

translation.en: And the first heart turned blue when Glummy Glooma touched it!
translation.es: El primer corazón se puso azul cuando Glummy lo tocó.

translation.en: I think Glummy's the only person who can help us now.
translation.es: Glummy es el único que puede ayudarnos.

translation.en: Let's go back to Soggy Bottom Swamp.
Glummy's tree was just up ahead.
translation.es: El árbol de Glummy estaba por allí.

translation.en: Wait a minute! Hey, is that who I think it is?
Rainbow King?
A groggy, foggy day to you, True.
Hey! This is my alone zone.
translation.es: No te me acerques, quiero estar solo.

translation.en: Bartleby, everyone's been gloomified by the unhappy hearts.
translation.es: Bartleby, los corazones azules pusieron tristes a todos.

translation.en: And they're all here in the Soggy Bottom Swamp.
translation.es: Y todos vinieron al pantano Mojado.

translation.en: The best part of being the only person who didn't like Happy Hearts Day
translation.es: Lo mejor de no festejar el Día de los Corazones

translation.en: was being by myself.
This is terrible, which is something I usually enjoy.
translation.es: Esto es horrible, y por lo general eso me encanta.

translation.en: Now, even terrible is ruined for me.
translation.es: Ya ni siquiera puedo disfrutar las cosas horribles.

translation.en: Glummy, wait!
Oh! Happy Hearts Day is ruined!
It's supposed to be the happiest day of the year.
translation.es: Debía ser el día más feliz del año.

translation.en: And we're supposed to share happy thoughts
and make everyone happy.
Maybe not everyone wants to be happy.
translation.es: Quizás no todos quieren estar felices.

translation.en: Why wouldn't you want to be happy?
Because I like being glum.
- That's it! - What's it?
Glummy, is it OK if I come join you?
I suppose.
Thank you, Glummy.
- Wow! - Yeah.
It's beautiful, isn't it?
You're right, Glummy.
This is beautiful.
Glummy, if you had your own special day, what would you want?
translation.es: Glummy, si tuvieras tu propio día, ¿qué te gustaría?

translation.en: Well... It wouldn't be sunny. I don't like the sun. It hurts my eyes.
translation.es: No estaría soleado. El sol me irrita los ojos.

translation.en: So, it would be foggy instead?
translation.es: Así que estaría nublado y con niebla.

translation.en: Yeah, that would be better.
I do like the fog. It's so...mysterious.
translation.es: Me gusta la niebla. Es muy misteriosa.

translation.en: - I don't like mysterious fog. - OK.
translation.es: No me gusta lo misterioso. De acuerdo.

translation.en: Non- mysterious fog. What else?
Mm? No chirpy birds. They hurt my ears.
translation.es: El pio de los pájaros me molesta.

translation.en: Sometimes I feel like that, too, especially when I just want to sleep in.
translation.es: ¡A veces a mí también! Cuando quiero dormir un rato más.

translation.en: Exactly!
I think I get it now. Your special day would just be...
translation.es: Ahora lo entiendo. Tu día especial sería...

translation.en: different.
Are you calling me different?
That's the best compliment I've had all day.
translation.es: Es lo más halagador que oí.

translation.en: We can call it Glum Chums Who Like To Be Alone By Themselves To Wallow All Day...Day.
translation.es: Podemos llamarlo Día de los Tristes que Quieren estar Solos Todo el Día.

translation.en: How about Glum Chums Day, for short?
translation.es: ¿Y si lo acortamos a Día de los Tristes?

translation.en: That sounds great. Uh!
Blue. My favourite colour.
I can see why you like it, Glummy. It's beautiful.
translation.es: Ya veo por qué te gusta, Glummy. Es precioso.

translation.en: And for me, so is pink. I love it because it makes me feel so happy.
translation.es: A mí me gusta el rosa. El rosa me hace sentir feliz,

translation.en: And you like blue because it makes you feel so gloomy.
translation.es: y a ti el azul te hace sentir triste.

translation.en: Glummy, I've got an idea!
- Let's try something. - Well...OK.
translation.es: Probemos algo. De acuerdo. Pero lo hago por ti, Vera.

translation.en: Just because it's you, True.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Pero lo hago por ti, Vera.

translation.en: True, what are you doing?!
What's happening?
Um, what just happened?
I have no idea.
Purple. Not bad.
- This is actually kinda fun. - Finally, we agree on something.
translation.es: Es muy divertido. Por fin coincidimos en algo.

translation.en: This purple rain is the best!
I've never seen you laugh like that.
translation.es: Nunca te vi reír así, ¡qué ternura!

translation.en: - It's so cute. - Purple rain is...OK, I guess.
translation.es: Nunca te vi reír así, ¡qué ternura! Supongo que me gusta la lluvia violeta.

translation.en: It doesn't make me unhappy.
Precipitous purple! How delightful to see you all here!
translation.es: ¡Violeta victorioso! Qué alegría verlos a todos aquí.

translation.en: Rainbow King, isn't this purple rain amazing?
translation.es: ¡Rey Arcoíris! ¿No es genial esta lluvia violeta?

translation.en: It certainly is!
Uh! I almost forgot! The Wishing Tree!
translation.es: Casi lo olvido. ¡El árbol de los deseos!

translation.en: It's still covered with blue hearts!
We need to get this purple rain over to the Wishing Tree!
translation.es: Debemos llevar esta lluvia hasta allí.

translation.en: Cumulo!
Hi, Cumulo. Do you think you might be able to push this purple raincloud
translation.es: ¿Puedes empujar esta nube de lluvia violeta

translation.en: out of Soggy Bottom Swamp and into the Rainbow Kingdom?
translation.es: desde el pantano hasta el reino Arcoíris?

translation.en: Thanks for everything, Glummy!
- Bye! - See you, Glummy! Bye- bye!
So long.
The purple rain is turning the Glummy blue hearts back to happy hearts.
translation.es: La lluvia violeta regresa la felicidad a los corazones.

translation.en: But it's not big enough to cover all the blue hearts and all the blue citizens too.
translation.es: Pero no es suficiente para todos los corazones y ciudadanos.

translation.en: I've got an idea that can help get all the blue hearts pink again.
translation.es: Tengo una idea para que los corazones sean rosados de nuevo.

translation.en: It's time for my third Wish!
Zip Zap Zoo, I choose you!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, te elijo a ti!

translation.en: Wake up, Sizer! Wish come true!
- Hi, Sizer. -
Ready to make that purple raincloud super- duper big?
- Go, Sizer! - Ooooh!
- Thanks, Goopy. Thanks, Sizer. -
translation.es: Gracias, Goompy. A ti también, Sizer.

translation.en: Zoo, Zip, Zap, Wishes in my pack!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, deseos a mi mochila!

translation.en: Fantastic fuchsia!
Thank you, True, for saving the day and making it extra special.
translation.es: Vera, gracias por salvar el día y hacer que sea aún más especial.

translation.en: But the day wouldn't have needed saving if I'd just let Glummy Glooma be himself.
translation.es: Pero no hubiera sido necesario si no hubiera intentado cambiar a Glummy.

translation.en: That's OK, True. Now we know for the next Happy Hearts Day.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Lo sabemos para la próxima vez.

translation.en: You're right. It's OK that Glummy is alone in his swamp.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Está bien que Glummy se quede en el pantano.

translation.en: As long as he feels what he wants to feel.
translation.es: Siempre que haga lo que él quiera.

translation.en: Thanks, Glummy. And happy Glum Chums Day.
translation.es: Gracias, Glummy, y feliz Día de los Tristes.

translation.en: I'm soaking wet. I can't see a thing in this fog.
translation.es: Estoy empapado. Y no veo nada con esta niebla.

translation.en: And I'm all alone in my Soggy Swamp.
Perfect!
